XIII.ii.2.A.1.f
.
When Evidence Does Not Establish Eligibility for Civil Service Preference
If evidence in the claims folder does not establish eligibility under one of the criteria shown in
M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart ii, 2.A.1.b
, do
not
undertake additional development to certify duty during a campaign or expedition for which a campaign medal has been authorized.
Note
:Â  If the Veteran alleges such service, refer him/her to the proper service department for assistance.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A - Civil Service Veterans' Preference Letter
citation: Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A
